'''Oracle Pillar''' is an exploration mechanic in [[Constellation Metropole]], [[Simulanka]]. The player can connect two Oracle Pillars to form a magic thread. The player may be able to fly across some of these magic threads. Sometimes one of the Oracle Pillars will need to be found by the player and placed accordingly.
